name: Souls (itch) (Ghostev / Khaled_khalil, khaled_games, Ghostev)
description:
Souls (itch) (Ghostev / Khaled_khalil, khaled_games, Ghostev) is a platformer game developed by khaled_games and Ghostev. It came out on 28-08-2022.
You can play Souls (itch) (Ghostev / Khaled_khalil, khaled_games, Ghostev) on Web and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
